RadioX-exchange-remote Pair Send token to myself Next Learn more Show notifications OK Settings About Reset and pair againxc Show notifications No Webcam? No Webcam? Congratulations, you are all set.
    
RadioX is an open-source desktop application that allows you to buy and sell bitcoins in exchange for national currencies, or alternative crypto currencies. Do you want to use your computer's webcam or do you want to send an email to yourself? After pairing this app to RadioX on your computer, you will be able to monitor your trades. Pair your phone with RadioX Please open the RadioX desktop app on your computer and go to Account -> Notifications. Then copy this Pairing token into the field "Pairing token":

 

The pairing token contains your excryption key (AES/CBC/NOPadding with initialization vector) which is used by RadioX to encrypt the notifications for you and a token from Google that identifies this app. RadioX notifications Send the email to yourself.

Then go to your computer and open the RadioX App.

Open Account -> Notifications

Then open the email and paste the Pairing token into RadioX.

Your phone will automatically receive a confirmation notification. Go to your computer and open the RadioX App.

Open Account -> Notifications

Then press "Scan QR code".

Your phone will automatically receive a confirmation notification. Congratulations, you are all set. instructions Resend email Bisq_notification_channel bisq_broadcast About RadioX notifications About RadioX Add example notification Mark all as read Delete all notifications
